title: Bike Check: The tribute custom Cervelo S5 made for Sepp Kuss in the Vuelta a España
content:
A custom Cervelo made for Kuss as Jumbo-Visma wins all three Grand Tours for the first time in cycling history.

Read the full article at Bike Check: The tribute custom Cervelo S5 made for Sepp Kuss in the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
